parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create new [[Eden Entity]]. Used for creating individual entities; to create a [[Eden_Editor:_Composition|composition]] (e.g., infantry squad), use [[create3DENComposition]].
<br><br>
This is the only way how to add new editable entities to [[Eden Editor]] scenario. Other 'create' commands like [[createVehicle]] or [[createUnit]] will still work, but the resulting entity won't be editable. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''create3DENEntity''' [mode, class, position, (isEmpty)] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] - can be "Object", "Trigger", "Waypoint", "Logic" or "Marker" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - entity class, defined in one of the following classes:
* ''CfgVehicles'' - objects and logic entities
* ''CfgNonAIVehicles'' - triggers
* ''CfgWaypoint'' - waypoints
* ''CfgMarkers'' - markers
  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] in format [[Position]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> isEmpty (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to create vehicle without crew (default: [[false]])  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Eden Entity]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> group '''create3DENEntity''' [mode, class, position, (isEmpty)] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] - group in which an AI character or waypoint is created.
* When missing for AI characters, new group is created for them
* When missing for waypoints, an error is logged and nothing is created
* When used on any other mode, group is ignored and entity is created as usual
 </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] - can be "Object", "Trigger", "Waypoint", "Logic" or "Marker" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - entity class </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] in format [[Position]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> isEmpty (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to create vehicle without crew (default: [[false]]) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER25</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[Eden Entity]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>dude1 = [[create3DENEntity]] ["Object","B_Soldier_F",[[screenToWorld]] [0.5,0.5]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>dude2 = ([[group]] dude1) [[create3DENEntity]] ["Object","B_Soldier_AR_F",[[screenToWorld]] [0.5,0.5]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>myMarker = [[create3DENEntity]] ["Marker","mil_warning",[[position]] [[player]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>mytrigger = [[create3DENEntity]] ["Trigger","EmptyDetectorArea10x10",[[position]] [[player]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>
[[create3DENComposition]] 
[[delete3DENEntities]]
</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
